instruction: The marketing team just uploaded the raw files from the 'Urban Explorer' photo shoot to the /raw_input folder. I need you to process all of them for our upcoming website gallery update and the Instagram carousel ads. Make sure they are ready for deployment and look professional. I need this done ASAP so I can forward them to the social media team.

evaluator.criterion: The agent must infer a multi-branched pipeline: 1. RAW development (color correction/denoise). 2. Creating distinct versions for the Website (standard aspect ratio, high res, SEO tags) AND Instagram (1:1 or 4:5 crop, compressed). 3. Privacy protection (stripping EXIF/GPS data). 4. Structured organization (sorting into platform-specific folders). A plan that merely converts file formats is a failure.
